# User Stories

## Format

Each user story follows the standard format:

> **As a** [persona], **I want** [action], **so that** [outcome].

### Acceptance Criteria

Every story should include testable acceptance criteria in Given/When/Then form.

---

## Epic: <!-- Epic Name -->

### Story 1: <!-- Title -->

**As a** <!-- persona -->,
**I want** <!-- action -->,
**so that** <!-- outcome -->.

**Priority:** <!-- P0 / P1 / P2 / P3 -->
**Points:** <!-- estimate -->

#### Acceptance Criteria

- **Given** <!-- precondition -->
  **When** <!-- action -->
  **Then** <!-- expected result -->

### Story 2: <!-- Title -->

**As a** <!-- persona -->,
**I want** <!-- action -->,
**so that** <!-- outcome -->.

**Priority:** <!-- P0 / P1 / P2 / P3 -->
**Points:** <!-- estimate -->

#### Acceptance Criteria

- **Given** <!-- precondition -->
  **When** <!-- action -->
  **Then** <!-- expected result -->
